metadata.synopsis: The player attampts to hit the crystals, and finds them immune to their assault. and the narrator describes the magic being very powerful (setup for the Orphic Hammer in END).
metadata.how_to_trigger: The discerning player notices that the red crystals have health bars and tries to give them a tap.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The rock resists all attempts to shatter it.*
